events.title: Osher Cohen & Odeya
events.location: Miami Beach, Florida, United States Of America

events.title: Osher Cohen & Odeya
events.location: Hollywood, California, United States Of America
events.description: Osher Cohen and Odeya are Israeli singers and songwriters whose music fuses elements of eastern Mizrahi music (Oriental-Middle Eastern) and Western Pop instrumentation. Dominating the charts in Israel, Osher?s and Odeya?s music is both upbeat and soulful while their distinct and unique singing style pulls on every emotion. The two are joining forces for their first and special tour in the United States where they will share the stage together and separately to create an unforgettable experience.
